0 sodium (Cashew Butter/Collagen Powder/Cacao Powder Unsweetened/Pitted Date Data Missing)

0 cost (Cashew Butter/Collagen Powder/Cacao Powder Unsweetened/Pitted Date Data Missing)

Vegan Recipe

Estimated Time: 5 Minutes

Timer 5 minutes Soak dates in a bowl
Put 1 cup Cashew Butter ½ cup Collagen Powder ¼ cup Cacao Powder Unsweetened 4 Tbsp Water in blender
Blend for 5 seconds
Put in 10 Pitted Dates
Blend for 5 seconds, stir, repeat until dough like
Take a tbsp of batter and cut on cutting board, repeat until no more batter. Makes 15
Put in freezer
